description:
Excellent Course!

"Everything that you have to know about how to create a web site in a simple and easy way" 5 Star from Ricardo Celis

Awesome course for the newbie!

This is an excellent course for anyone with no prior knowledge. Khalid walks the beginner step by step through the process. Once you complete this course, you will have a beautiful site and business ready to roll! 5 Stars from Mindy Squillace

and many more..

Course Published: January, 2015

Last Updated: January, 2015

Did you ever create a website? If NO then this is the best course for you.

As the name suggests, this course is all about how to create websites. There is a small difference in this course than other courses that you see. This is a practical course. I am doing everything live in this course for you. From buying a domain to managing a hosting account, from setting up scripts to modifying tools, you will learn everything here in a live project with me.

Note: I will cover both the free methods and the paid (original) methods of creating a website so if you don't want to invest in hosting, you don't have to.

What Will Be Your Benefit:

I can guaranty that after you finish this course, you will be able to create websites on any niche you want without anyone's help. From eCommerce to the President's website, you will be able to create everything if you finish this course.

What are Your Added Benefits:

  1. You will learn how to earn with your website from Internet (A Full Guide on Setting Up Advertisements)
  2. You will learn how to work as a freelance Web Developer (A Full Guide on setting up and finding jobs on web development niche)
  3. You can even start your web development business after you are done with this course.

How Long Will It Take To Complete This Course?

It should not take more than 1-2 weeks to complete this course. I am describing everything in the easiest possible way for you and if you do things with me, there is no way that you will take more than 2 weeks to finish this course.

This is a pure video based course. I explained everything via video.

Finally, the last question: Why should you take this course?

You should take this course for these reasons:

  • First of all, you will learn how to create and operate websites. The whole process.
  • You will be able to start your career as a freelance web developer (WordPress) if you take this course
  • You will be able to create websites on any niche you want. May be you can start a web-development company in your country finishing this course
  • You can easily find jobs on this niche as web developers are always demanded by different companies.

Billions of websites are created everyday and the world is getting more and more digital in every second. Be a part of this journey. Learn how to be a part of this journey with me. You will not regret it.
title: Create a Professional Website Without Programming/Coding
